Package index

Data cube creation

Functions for creating data cubes.

dcc() dcc2() dcc5()
Data cube creation (dcc)
dcc6() dcc6_fixed()
Data cube creation

Distribution estimation

Functions for estimating empirical distribution function and other statistics.

Fhat_df_()
Weighted empirical cumulative distribution function (data frame version)
Fhat_conditional_()
Weighted empirical cumulative distribution function (ecdf), conditional on one or more variables
wq()
Empirical weighted quantile

jointfun_

Function that counts the number of observations by groups in a data frame.

jointfun_()
A minimal function which counts the number of observations by groups in a data frame

Data

Data sets included in distrr and used in examples and vignettes..

invented_wages
Invented dataset with wages of men and women.

Other

combn_char()
Generate all combinations of the elements of a character vector
distrr distrr-package
distrr: Estimate and Manage Empirical Distributions
extract_unique() extract_unique2() extract_unique3() extract_unique4() extract_unique5()
Functions to be used in conjunction with 'dcc' family
only_joint()
Keeps only joint distribution (removes '.total').
